name: RunNotebook
description: AzureML Pipelines Task for running Jupyter Notebooks on AML Compute
author: ms-air-aiagility

inputs.name: connectedServiceName
inputs.label: AzureML Workspace
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure Machine Learning Workspace

inputs.name: pathFilter
inputs.label: Path to ipynb file(s) to run on AzureML
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Pattern to search for ipynb file(s) to run.

You can separate multiple patterns with a semicolon, and you can make a pattern negative by prefixing it with '!'. Example: `**\*.ipynb;!**\*.Tests.ipynb`

inputs.name: condaDependencies
inputs.label: Path to explicit specification file to build conda environment.
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Pattern to search for explicit specification file to build conda environment.

The file is not required, but if this path filter matches more than one file the task will fail.

messages.NoMatchingNotebooks: No matching files were found with search pattern: %s
messages.NotAFile: The given path was not a file: %s
messages.NoServiceConnection: No serviceConnection was given in input
